com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.animation

Class SpriteAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.animation.SpriteAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.State<GameObject>

    public class SpriteAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.State<GameObject>
    Used for animating sprites. SpriteAnimations are managed by a SpriteAnimator to determine which sprite animation to play.

    For SpriteAnimation to work, the host GameObject must have a SpriteRenderer attached!

    See Also:
    SpriteAnimator

        cols - the number of columns
        rows - the number rows
        frameDuration - the duration (in seconds) for a single frame of the animation
